languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} an ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Fires Ionic Blast shot
Ionic Blast cannot crit but depletes target shields from 3 sides at once and applies Ionic effect wich reduces its hit and crit chances during next round

Fires ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from the 3 sides (except the furthest side from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

Fires ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from the 3 sides (except the furthest side from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

Fires an ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

languages.text:
Стреляет ионными зарядами.
Ионные заряды не совершают критические попадания. При попадании ионный заряд немедленно снимает щиты цели с 3 сторон (кроме дальней) и накладывает эффект, сокращающий для цели шанс попадания и критического попадания в течение следующего раунда.

Стреляет ионными зарядами.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Feuert{/g} einen Ionenstrahl ab.
Ionenstrahlen verursachen niemals kritische Treffer. Im Falle eines Treffers entfernt der Ionenstrahl die Schilde des Ziels sofort auf 3 Seiten (mit Ausnahme der am weitesten entfernten Seite). Ferner reduziert der Ioneneffekt in der nächsten Runde die Trefferchance und die kritische Trefferchance des Ziels.

Ionenstrahlen verursachen niemals kritische Treffer. Im Falle eines Treffers entfernt der Ionenstrahl die Schilde des Ziels sofort auf 3 Seiten (mit Ausnahme der am weitesten entfernten Seite). Ferner reduziert der Ioneneffekt in der nächsten Runde die Trefferchance und die kritische Trefferchance des Ziels.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Tire{/g} une charge ionique.
Les charges ioniques ne peuvent pas infliger de coups critiques. Elles explosent immédiatement à l'impact et neutralisent le bouclier de la cible sur 3 côtés (y compris le côté le plus éloigné de l'attaquant) en plus d'infliger l'effet Ionisé, qui réduit les chances d'infliger des coups normaux et critiques lors du prochain round.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} an ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Dispara{/g} una descarga iónica.
Las descargas iónicas nunca producen impactos críticos. Cuando alcanza al blanco, la descarga iónica neutraliza inmediatamente todos sus escudos en 3 flancos (excepto el más alejado del atacante) y le inflige un efecto iónico que reduce sus probabilidades de impacto e impacto crítico durante el siguiente asalto.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} an ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Dispara{/g} una descarga iónica.
Las descargas iónicas nunca producen impactos críticos. Cuando alcanza al blanco, la descarga iónica neutraliza inmediatamente todos sus escudos en 3 flancos (excepto el más alejado del atacante) y le inflige un efecto iónico que reduce sus probabilidades de impacto e impacto crítico durante el siguiente asalto.

languages.text:
イオンブラストを{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}発射{/g}する。
イオンブラストはクリティカルヒットにならない。命中した場合、イオンブラストは即座に対象の3面（攻撃側から最も遠い面を除く）のシールドを剥がし、対象にイオン効果を与え、次のラウンドの命中率とクリティカルヒットの確率を下げる。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} an ionic blast.
Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

traits.locale_text:
イオンブラストを{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}発射{/g}する。
イオンブラストはクリティカルヒットにならない。命中した場合、イオンブラストは即座に対象の3面（攻撃側から最も遠い面を除く）のシールドを剥がし、対象にイオン効果を与え、次のラウンドの命中率とクリティカルヒットの確率を下げる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}发射{/g}离子爆破。
离子爆破无法造成暴击。当离子爆破命中目标时，会立刻移除目标三个方向的护盾（不包括离攻击者最远方向的护盾），同时对目标施加“离子效应”效果，降低目标下一轮的命中率与暴击率。

Ionic blasts never score critical hits. When hit, the ionic blast immediately removes the target's shields from 3 sides (excluding the side furthest from the attacker) and inflicts the ionic effect on the target, reducing its hit and critical hit chances during the next round.

{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}发射{/g}离子爆破。
离子爆破无法造成暴击。当离子爆破命中目标时，会立刻移除目标三个方向的护盾（不包括离攻击者最远方向的护盾），同时对目标施加“离子效应”效果，降低目标下一轮的命中率与暴击率。
